Original Translation: وملي نزل يسوع من الجبل، تبعوه بزاف د الجماعات ديال الناس.
Translated Sentence: Yesu dai bum kaw na yu wa ai shaloi masha wunawng wuwa kaba shi kaw hkan nang ma ai.

Original: A man who had a skin disease came and got down on his knees in front of Jesus. He said, "Lord, if you are willing to make me 'clean,' you can do it."
Original Translation: وقرب لعنده واحد المجدام، وسجد ليه وݣال: «آ سيدي، إلا بغيتي، راك تقدر تردني طاهر».
Translated Sentence: فَجَاءَ رَجُلٌ مَرِيضٌ جَلْدًا وَجَثَا عِنْدَهُ قَائِلًا: "يَا رَبُّ ، إِنْ أَرَدْتَ تَقْدِرُ أَنْ تُطَهِّرَنِي".

Original: Jesus reached out his hand and touched the man. "I am willing to do it," he said. "Be 'clean'!"  Right away the man was healed of his skin disease.
Original Translation: وهو يمد يسوع يده ومسه وݣال: «أنا بغيت إيوا كون طاهر!». وفديك الساعة تحيد منه الجدام وولى طاهر.
Translated Sentence: Jesus streckte seine Hand aus und berührte den Mann. "Ich will es", sagte er. "Sei rein!" Und sofort wurde der Mann von seiner Hautkrankheit geheilt.

Original: Then Jesus said to him, "Don't tell anyone. Go and show yourself to the priest. Offer the gift Moses commanded. It will be a witness to them." A Roman Commander Has Faith
Original Translation: وݣال ليه يسوع: «رد بالك باش ما تݣولها لحتى شي حد، ولكن سير ووري داتك لراجل الدين، وعطي الهدية اللي وصى بيها موسى، باش يكون هادشي شهادة ليهم». الخدام ديال القايد د العسكر كيتشافى
Translated Sentence: Shaloi Yesu gaw, "Ndai lam kadai hpe mung hkum tsun et; hkinjawng wa kaw sa nna, nang hpe madun dan u; shanhte a matu sakse tai u ga, Mawshe hkangda ai kumhpa nawng ya u, " ngu nna shi hpe hkangda wu ai.

Original: When Jesus entered Capernaum, a Roman commander came to him. He asked Jesus for help.
Original Translation: وملي دخل يسوع لكفرناحوم، جا لعنده واحد القايد د العسكر كيرغبه،
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw Kaperna-um mare de shang wa yang, Roma hpyenbu langai mi shi kaw sa du nna, shi hpe hpyi nem wu ai.

Original: "Lord," he said, "my servant lies at home and can't move. He is suffering terribly."
Original Translation: وݣال ليه: «آ سيدي، الخدام ديالي فالدار طايح فالفراش مشلول وكيتعدب بزاف».
Translated Sentence: "Madu e, nye a mayam wa gaw nta e yup nga nna, lagaw n htawt lu ai hte grai machyi nga ai, " ngu nna shi hpe tsun wu ai.

Original: Jesus said, "I will go and heal him."
Original Translation: وهو يݣول ليه يسوع: «هاني غادي نمشي باش نشافيه».
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw, Ngai sa nna shi hpe shamai ya na we ai, ngu wu ai.

Original: The commander replied, "Lord, I am not good enough to have you come into my house. But just say the word, and my servant will be healed.
Original Translation: وجاوبه القايد د العسكر: «أنا ما نستاهلش آ سيدي تدخل تحت سقف داري، ولكن ݣول غير كلمة وحدة والخدام ديالي غيتشافى.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi hpyenbu wa gaw, Madu e, nang nye a nta de shang lu na, ngai n ging n dan nngai; ga sha tsun u, shaloi nye a mayam mai mat na ra ai.

Original: I myself am a man under authority. And I have soldiers who obey my orders. I tell this one, 'Go,' and he goes. I tell that one, 'Come,' and he comes. I say to my servant, 'Do this,' and he does it."
Original Translation: حيت حتى أنا كاين اللي كيحكم في وعندي عسكر كنحكم فيه، كنݣول لهادا: سير! وكيمشي، وكنݣول للاخر: أجي! وكيجي، وكنݣول للعبد ديالي: دير هادي! وكيديرها».
Translated Sentence: Kaning rai nme law, ngai mung ahkang aya lu ai wa rai nga nngai; nye a hkangda ai ga hkan ai hpyen masha ni mung ngai lu nngai: langai mi hpe, Sa su, ngu yang, shi sa wa ai; langai mi hpe, Sa rit, ngu yang, shi sa wa ai; mayam wa hpe, Ndai galaw u, ngu yang, shi galaw nga ai, ngu wu ai.

Original: When Jesus heard this, he was amazed. He said to those following him, "What I'm about to tell you is true. In Israel I have not found anyone whose faith is so strong.
Original Translation: وملي سمعه يسوع تعجب وݣال لهادوك اللي تابعينه: «نݣول ليكم الحق: ما لقيت حتى شي واحد فإسرائيل عنده إيمان قوي بحال هادا.
Translated Sentence: Yesu dai ga na jang mau mat nna, shi kaw hkan nang ai ni hpe, Nanhte hpe ngai teng teng tsun made ga, Israela amyu hta e pyi, ndai daram kamsham ai wa ngai n mu yu nngai, ngu nna tsun mu ai.

Original: "I say to you that many will come from the east and the west. They will take their places at the feast in the kingdom of heaven. They will sit with Abraham, Isaac and Jacob.
Original Translation: وراني نݣول ليكم بلي بزاف د الناس غادي يجيو من الشرق والغرب ويݣلسو ياكلو مع إبراهيم وإسحاق ويعقوب فمملكة السماوات. لوقا
Translated Sentence: Bai ngai nanhte hpe tsun made ga, Sinpraw mung, sinna mung na masha law law wa sa nna, sumsing lamu a mungdan hta e Abraham, Isak hte Yaku hte rau dung nga na mara ai.

Original: But those who think they belong to the kingdom will be thrown outside, into the darkness. There they will sob and grind their teeth."
Original Translation: أما هادوك اللي كان خاصهم يكونو فالمملكة، غيترماو على برا فالضلمة، تم فين غيكون البكا وتغزاز السنان». متى
Translated Sentence: Dai mungdan hta lawm na nga myit ai ni chyawm gaw, shinggan de, nsin chyip hta kabai kau ai hkrum na mara ai: dai yang e shanhte hkrapngu hkrapngoi ai hte wa hkrapngoi ai hkrum na mara ai, ngu nna shanhte hpe tsun mu ai.

Original: Then Jesus said to the Roman commander, "Go! It will be done just as you believed it would."  And his servant was healed at that very hour. Jesus Heals Many People
Original Translation: ومن بعد، ݣال يسوع للقايد د العسكر: «سير! على قد الإيمان ديالك، غادي يكون ليك داكشي اللي بغيتي». وفديك الساعة نيت تشافى الخدام دياله. يسوع كيشافي نسيبة بطرس وبزاف د الناس
Translated Sentence: Shaloi Yesu gaw, "Wa u, nang kamsham ai hte maren, byin wa u ga, " ngu nna hpyenbu kaba hpe tsun wu ai. Dai ahkying hta e shi a mayam wa mai mat wa ai.

Original: When Jesus came into Peter's house, he saw Peter's mother-in-law. She was lying in bed. She had a fever.
Original Translation: وملي دخل يسوع لدار بطرس، لقا نسيبة بطرس طايحة فالفراش حيت فيها السخانة.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw Petru a nta de shang wa yang, shi a katsa gaw, masin kahtet ai hte yup pyaw nga ai hpe mu wu ai.

Original: Jesus touched her hand, and the fever left her. She got up and began to wait on him.
Original Translation: ومس يسوع يدها، وهي تمشي منها السخانة، وناضت وضايفته.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi Yesu gaw shi a lata hpe ahtawk wu ai rai nna, dai kahtet ai gaw shi kaw na pru mat wa ai: shi mung rawt nna shi hpe dawjau nga ai.

Original: When evening came, many people controlled by demons were brought to Jesus. He drove out the spirits with a word. He healed all who were sick.
Original Translation: وملي وصلات العشية، جابو ليه بزاف د الناس مسكونين بالجنون، وخرج الجنون بكلمة منه، وشفى ݣاع المرضى.
Translated Sentence: Ya shana de du jang, nat kap ai ni law law hpe shi hpang de la sa mu ai: shi mung dai nat ni hpe ga hte shaden kau nna, machyi makaw hkrum ai ni nlang hte hpe shamai ya mu ai.

Original: He did it to make what the prophet Isaiah had said come true. He had said, "He suffered the things we should have suffered.  He took on himself the sicknesses that should have been ours." (Isaiah 53:4) It Costs to Follow Jesus
Original Translation: وهكا تحقق الكلام اللي ݣال النبي إشعيا: «هو اللي خدا وجعنا وهز مرضنا». كيفاش خاص يكونو هادوك اللي كيتبعو يسوع
Translated Sentence: Er tat dies, um zu erfüllen, was der Prophet Jesaja gesagt hatte: "Er erlitten hat, was wir leiden sollten, und er nahm unsere Krankheiten auf sich" (Jesaja 53:4).

Original: Jesus saw the crowd around him. So he gave his disciples orders to go to the other side of the Sea of Galilee.
Original Translation: وملي شاف يسوع الجماعة د الناس ضايرين بيه، آمر التلامد دياله باش يقطعو للجهة لخرى ديال البحر.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw shi a grupyin e shawa masha law law nga ma ai hpe mu wu yang, nawng wora hkran de sa wa na matu shi a sape ni hpe hkang dat mu ai.

Original: Then a teacher of the law came to him. He said, "Teacher, I will follow you no matter where you go."
Original Translation: وهو يقرب لعنده واحد من العلما د الشرع وݣال ليه: «آ سيدي، غادي نتبعك فين ما مشيتي».
Translated Sentence: Shaloi laika ka ai sara langai mi shi kaw sit sa nna, Sara e, nang sa ai shara shagu hkan e ngai nang hpe hkan nang na we ai, ngu wu ai.

Original: Jesus replied, "Foxes have holes. Birds of the air have nests. But the Son of Man has no place to lay his head."
Original Translation: وجاوبه يسوع وݣال: «التعالب عندها غيرانها، وطيور السما عندها عشاشها، ولكن ولد الإنسان راه ما عنده حتى فين يسند راسه».
Translated Sentence: فَقَالَ لَهُ يَسُوعُ: "لِلْبَعُوضِ جُوَارِعٌ ، وَلِطُيُورِ ٱلسَّمَاءِ أَعْوَارٌ ، وَأَمَّا ٱبْنُ ٱلْإِنْسَانِ فَلَيْسَ لَهُ مَكَانٌ يَضَعُ رَأْسَهُ".

Original: Another follower said to him, "Lord, first let me go and bury my father."
Original Translation: وݣال ليه واحد آخر من تلامده: «آ سيدي، خليني بعد نمشي ندفن با».
Translated Sentence: Dai rai nna sape kaga langai mi gaw, Madu e, nye wa hpe lup makoi na matu shawng ngai sa wa na ahkang jaw mi, ngu nna shi hpe tsun wu ai.

Original: But Jesus told him, "Follow me. Let the dead bury their own dead." Jesus Calms the Storm
Original Translation: ولكن يسوع جاوبه: «غير تبعني نت وخلي الموتى يدفنو الموتى ديالهم!». يسوع كيهدن واحد الرعدة
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw, "Ngai kaw hkan nang rit, si mat ai ni tinang si ai ni hpe lup makoi mu ga, " ngu nna shi hpe tsun wu ai. Shaloi Yesu gaw dai nbung laru hpe shamu shamawt wu ai.

Original: Jesus got into a boat. His disciples followed him.
Original Translation: وملي ركب يسوع فالفلوكة، تبعوه تلامده.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi shi gaw li hta shang nna, shi a sape ni mung shi kaw hkan nang ma ai.

Original: Suddenly a terrible storm came up on the lake. The waves crashed over the boat. But Jesus was sleeping.
Original Translation: وجات واحد الريح قوية بزاف فالبحر حتى عمرو الماج الفلوكة، وكان يسوع ناعس.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi jang, nawng ntsa e nbung kaba kaba langai mi rawt nna, hka leng ni gaw li hpe kabye kau mu ai: shi chyawm gaw yup nga ai.

Original: The disciples went and woke him up. They said, "Lord! Save us! We're going to drown!"
Original Translation: وقربو لعنده تلامده وفيقوه وݣالو ليه: «عتقنا آ سيدي، راه حنا كنموتو!»،
Translated Sentence: Sape ni sa nna shi hpe jahkrung mu ai hte, Madu e, anhte hkyehkrang la mi; anhte hka hta kadawng mat ga ai, ngu mu ai.

Original: He replied, "Your faith is so small! Why are you so afraid?"  Then Jesus got up and ordered the winds and the waves to stop. It became completely calm.
Original Translation: وهو يݣول ليهم: «مالكم خايفين آ هاد قلال الإيمان؟». ومن بعد، ناض ونهض فالريح والبحر، وهي تهدن الدنيا.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi shi gaw, "Nanhte kamsham ai ni n law law, hpa rai hkrit nga myit ta? " ngu nna shanhte hpe tsun mu ai. Shaloi shi rawt nna, nbung hte hka hpung ni hpe shamu shamawt dat wu ai rai nna, dai yang e grai atsin sha nga ai.

Original: The disciples were amazed. They asked, "What kind of man is this? Even the winds and the waves obey him!" Jesus Heals Two Men Controlled by Demons
Original Translation: وتعجبو الرجال وݣالو: «شكون هو هادا اللي حتى الريح والبحر كيطيعوه؟». يسوع كيخرج الجنون من جوج د الرجال من الجدريين
Translated Sentence: Dai rai nna shanhte mau mahka nga nna, Ndai wa gaw kaning re ai wa rai nga a ta? nbung hte hka mung shi a ga madat nga ai, nga ma ai, ngu mu ai. Dai rai nna nat kap ai masha lahkawng hpe shi shamai ya mu ai.

Original: Jesus arrived at the other side of the lake in the area of the Gadarenes. Two men controlled by demons met him. They came from the tombs. The men were so wild that no one could pass that way.
Original Translation: وملي وصل يسوع للجهة لخرى من البحر حدا بلاد الجدريين، تلاقاو بيه جوج د الرجال مسكونين بالجنون خارجين من الروضة، وكانو خطر بزاف، حتى ما بقى حد قادر يدوز فديك الطريق.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw nawng wora hkran, Gadara mung de du jang, nat kap ai masha lahkawng gaw lup ni kaw na pru wa nna, shi hpe sa tau ma ai: dai lam hpe kadai mung n lai lu ma ai majaw, shanhte gaw grai wa hkrit gari nga ma ai.

Original: "Son of God, what do you want with us?" they shouted. "Have you come here to punish us before the time for us to be judged?"
Original Translation: وغير شافوه بداو كيغوتو وكيݣولو: «آش بينا وبينك آ ولد الله؟ واش جيتي لهنا باش تعدبنا قبل من الوقت؟».
Translated Sentence: Shanhte gaw, "Karai Kasang a Kasha e, nang anhte hte hpa seng nga n ta? Anhte hpe ari jaw na matu, garai n du yang, nang du sa n ni?, " nga nna jahtau ma ai.

Original: Not very far away, a large herd of pigs was feeding.
Original Translation: وكانت واحد القطعة ديال الحلالف كبيرة سارحة فواحد الموضع قريب لتم،
Translated Sentence: Dai kaw na tsan tsan e nga ai, wa hpung kaba langai mi sha nga ma ai.

Original: The demons begged Jesus, "If you drive us out, send us into the herd of pigs."
Original Translation: ورغبو الجنون يسوع وݣالو ليه: «إلا خرجتينا، صيفطنا ندخلو فالقطعة ديال الحلالف».
Translated Sentence: فَطَلَبَتِ ٱلشَّيَاطِينُ إِلَيْهِ قَائِلَةً: " إِنْ أَخْرَجْتَنَا ، فَأَرْسِلْنَا إِلَى قَطِيعِ ٱلْخَنَازِيرِ ".

Original: Jesus said to them, "Go!"  So the demons came out of the men and went into the pigs. The whole herd rushed down the steep bank. They ran into the lake and drowned in the water.
Original Translation: وهو يݣول ليهم: «سيرو!» ومشاو دخلو فيها، وجرات القطعة كلها وطاحت من الحافة ديال الجبل للبحر وغرقات فالما.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi shi gaw, Sa wa mu, ngu nna shanhte hpe tsun mu ai. Dai rai nna, dai ni kaw na pru wa nna, wa ni hta shang ma ai: dai wa hpung ting mung, dai hka kau de gat wa nna, nawng de gat wa nna, hka hta lup mat ma ai.

Original: Those who were tending the pigs ran off. They went into the town and reported all this. They told the people what had happened to the men who had been controlled by demons.
Original Translation: وهربو السراحا ومشاو للمدينة وخبرو بݣاع داكشي اللي جرا، وبداكشي اللي وقع للرجال اللي مسكونين بالجنون.
Translated Sentence: Dai rai nna shanhte hpe bau sin ai ni hprawng wa nna, mare de shang wa nna, dai nat kap ai ni hte hpa byin ai lam, masha ni hpe tsun dan mu ai.

Original: Then the whole town went out to meet Jesus. When they saw him, they begged him to leave their area.
Original Translation: وخرجو سكان المدينة كلهم باش يتلقاو ليسوع. وملي شافوه رغبوه يخرج من بلادهم.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi mare ting gaw Yesu hpe sa tau la na pru wa ma ai rai nna, shi hpe mu jang, shanhte a ginwang na pru wa na, shi hpe hpyi nem ma ai.

Original: Jesus Heals a Man Who Could Not Walk
Original Translation: الفصل التاسع يسوع كيشافي مشلول
Translated Sentence: Jésus asava mbeni koli so ayeke tambela nzoni pëpe

Original: Jesus stepped into a boat. He went over to the other side of the lake and came to his own town.
Original Translation: وركب يسوع فالفلوكة وقطع البحر ورجع لمدينته.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi Yesu gaw li hta shang nna, nawng wora hkran de rap sa wa nna, shi a buga de du wa ai.

Original: Some men brought to him a man who could not walk. He was lying on a mat. Jesus saw that they had faith. So he said to the man, "Don't lose hope, son. Your sins are forgiven."
Original Translation: وجابو ليه شي ناس واحد الراجل مشلول ناعس فوق الفراش. وملي شاف يسوع إيمانهم ݣال للمشلول: «تيق آ ولدي، راه تغفرو ليك دنوبك».
Translated Sentence: Shaloi masha nkau mi gaw, lagaw hten ai wa langai mi hpe yupku e taw nga ai hpe shi hpang de woi sa ma ai. Yesu gaw shanhte kamsham ai hpe mu wu yang, "Masha e, myit hkum kaji et, na a yubak mara ni raw dat kau ya nitdai, " ngu nna dai wa hpe tsun wu ai.

Original: Then some teachers of the law said to themselves, "This fellow is saying a very evil thing!"
Original Translation: وݣالو شي وحدين من العلما د الشرع فخاطرهم: «هاد الراجل كينطق بكلام الكفر!».
Translated Sentence: Shaloi laika ka ai sara nkau mi gaw, Ndai wa gaw n hkru ai ga tsun nga ai, nga nna tinang a kraw kata e tsun ma ai.

Original: Jesus knew what they were thinking. So he said, "Why do you have evil thoughts in your hearts?
Original Translation: وعرف يسوع فاش كيفكرو وݣال: «مالكم كتفكرو فحوايج خايبين فخاطركم؟
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw shanhte a myit mang ai lam chye wu ai rai nna, Nanhte a kraw lawang e hpa majaw n hkru ai myit rawng nga myit ta?

Original: Is it easier to say, 'Your sins are forgiven'? Or to say, 'Get up and walk'?
Original Translation: أما سهل، يتݣال: مغفورين ليك دنوبك، ولا يتݣال: نوض وسير؟
Translated Sentence: أَيُسْتَطِيعُ أَنْ يُقَالَ: مَغْفُورَةٌ لَكَ خَطَايَاكَ ، أَمْ أَنْ يُقَالَ: قُمْ وَٱمْشِ ؟

Original: I want you to know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins."  Then he spoke to the man who could not walk. "Get up," he said. "Take your mat and go home."
Original Translation: ولكن غادي نوريكم بلي ولد الإنسان عنده السلطة على الأرض باش يغفر الدنوب». وݣال للمشلول: «نوض هز فراشك وسير لدارك».
Translated Sentence: Dai rai nna, ga ntsa e yubak raw dat kau na ahkang, dai Masha Kasha hpe lu nga ai hpe nanhte chye lu myit ga, ngu nna tsun wu ai. Shaloi shi gaw lagaw hten ai wa hpe, Rawt u, na a yupku la nna, na a nta de wa su, ngu wu ai.

Original: The man got up and went home.
Original Translation: وناض الراجل ومشى لداره.
Translated Sentence: Ol adam turup, öýüne gaýtdy.

Original: When the crowd saw this, they were filled with wonder. They praised God for giving that kind of authority to men. Jesus Chooses Matthew
Original Translation: وملي شافو جماعات الناس داكشي اللي جرا، خافو وعطاو العز لله اللي عطى للناس سلطة بحال هادي. يسوع كيختار متى
Translated Sentence: Dai hpe mu ai shawa masha ni gaw mau mahka nga ma ai rai nna, masha ni hpe ndai zawn re ai ahkang aya jaw ya ai Karai Kasang hpe shagrau sha-a ma ai.

Original: As Jesus went on from there, he saw a man named Matthew. He was sitting at the tax collector's booth.  "Follow me," Jesus told him. Matthew got up and followed him.
Original Translation: وملي كان يسوع غادي من تم، شاف واحد الراجل سميته متى ݣالس فدار الضريبة. وهو يݣول ليه: «تبعني». وناض تبعه.
Translated Sentence: Yesu dai kaw na lai wa yang, hkansi hta na Htawtu ngu ai masha langai mi hpe dung nga ai mu wu ai rai nna, shi gaw, Ngai kaw hkan nang rit, ngu nna shi hpe tsun wu ai. Shaloi Mattu rawt nna shi kaw hkan nang wu ai.

Original: Later Jesus was having dinner at Matthew's house. Many tax collectors and "sinners" came. They ate with Jesus and his disciples.
Original Translation: ومن بعد ݣلس يسوع للماكلة فدار متى، وجاو عنده بزاف ديال مالين الضريبة والمدنبين وݣلسو معاه ومع تلامده. لوقا
Translated Sentence: Bai, Yesu gaw, Mahte a nta e shat sha nga yang, kang hta ai ni hte yubak kap ai ni law law wa sa nna, shi hte shi a sape ni hte rau dung nga ma ai.

Original: The Pharisees saw this. So they asked the disciples, "Why does your teacher eat with tax collectors and 'sinners'?"
Original Translation: وملي شافوه الفريسيين، ݣالو لتلامده: «علاش المعلم ديالكم كياكل مع مالين الضريبة والمدنبين؟».
Translated Sentence: Dai hpe Hparishe ni mu jang, Nanhte a sara gaw kang hta ai ni hte yubak kap ai ni hte hpa rai lusha nga a ta? ngu nna sape ni hpe san mu ai.

Original: Jesus heard that. So he said, "Those who are healthy don't need a doctor. Sick people do.
Original Translation: وملي سمعهم يسوع جاوبهم وݣال: «راه المرضى اللي محتاجين للطبيب، ماشي اللي بصحتهم.
Translated Sentence: Yesu dai na nna, "Hkum ja ai ni matu tsi sara n ra nga ai sha, machyi ai ni matu she ra nga ai.

Original: Go and learn what this means, 'I want mercy and not sacrifice.' (Hosea 6:6) I have not come to get those who think they are right with God to follow me. I have come to get sinners to follow me." Jesus Is Asked About Fasting
Original Translation: إيوا سيرو تعلمو المعنى ديال هاد الكلام: أنا راه بغيت الرحمة ماشي الدبيحة، حيت راني ما جيتش نعيط على اللي متاقيين الله، ولكن على المدنبين». السؤال على الصيام
Translated Sentence: '내가 바치는 바는 바가 아니라 자비가 필요'이라는 말 의 의미 를 배워 보십시오. (호세아 6:6) 하나님 앞 에서 옳다고 생각하는 사람 들 을 내 뒤를 따르게 하기 위해 온 것이 아니라 죄인 들 을 내 뒤를 따르게 하기 위해 온 것 입니다".

Original: One day John's disciples came. They said to Jesus, "We and the Pharisees go without eating. Why don't your disciples go without eating?"
Original Translation: ومن بعد جاو تلامد يوحنا المعمدان لعند يسوع وسولوه: «علاش حنا والفريسيين كنصومو بزاف، وتلامدك نت ما كيصوموش؟».
Translated Sentence: Shaloi Yawhan a sape ni sa du nna, Anhte hte Hparishe ni gaw lusha gam nga ga ai; na a sape ni gaw hpa rai lusha gam nga ma ta? ngu nna shi hpe san mu ai.

Original: Jesus answered, "How can the guests of the groom be sad while he is with them? The time will come when the groom will be taken away from them. Then they will fast.
Original Translation: وجاوبهم يسوع وݣال ليهم: «واش يقدرو المعروضين للعرس يحزنو والعريس معاهم؟ راه غادي يجي الوقت اللي غيتخاد العريس من بيناتهم وفديك الساعة غيصومو.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw, "Naw la nnan sa ai manam ni gaw, la nnan sa ai num la hte rau nga nga yang, shanhte myit yawn nga lu ma ai kun? La nnan sa ai num wa shanhte kaw na shaw la kau ai nhtoi du na ra ai rai nna, dai shaloi jang shanhte lusha gam na mara ai.

Original: "People don't sew a patch of new cloth on old clothes. The new piece will pull away from the old. That will make the tear worse.
Original Translation: حتى واحد ما كيرقع لباس قديم بطرف ديال التوب جديد، علاحقاش الرقعة غادي تكمش وتزيد التشريݣة تكبر.
Translated Sentence: "Masha gaw hpun palawng dingsa hta palawng nnan n jahpun ai sha, dai palawng nnan gaw dai hpun palawng dingsa hpe jahkrat kau na ra ai rai nna, dai hta grau nna hkala nba wa na ra ai.

Original: "People don't pour new wine into old wineskins. If they do, the skins will burst. The wine will run out, and the wineskins will be destroyed. No, everyone pours new wine into new wineskins. Then both are saved." A Dead Girl and a Suffering Woman
Original Translation: وحتى واحد ما كيدير الخمر الجديد فݣربات ديال الجلد قدام، حيت إلا تدار فيهم غيتفرݣعو وهكا غيضيع الخمر ويتشرݣو الݣربات. ولكن كنديرو الخمر الجديد فݣربات ديال الجلد جداد، باش ما يضيع لا خمر ولا ݣربات». بنت الرئيس والمراة اللي مسات حوايج يسوع
Translated Sentence: "Dai tsabyi jahku hpe mung, shanhpyi dingsa hta ka bang ai masha n rai; shing n rai yang gaw, shanhpyi ni htu mat na ra ai rai nna, tsabyi jahku mung, shanhpyi mung hten mat na ra ai. Masha shagu gaw tsabyi jahku hpe shanhpyi nnan hta ka bang ma ai rai nna, dai rai yang gaw shan lahkawng hkyehkrang la ai hkrum na mara ai, " ngu nna shanhte hpe tsun mu ai.

Original: While Jesus was saying this, a ruler came. He got down on his knees in front of Jesus. He said, "My daughter has just died. But come and place your hand on her. Then she will live again."
Original Translation: وملي كان كيݣول ليهم هادشي، جا عنده واحد الرئيس وسجد ليه وݣال: «بنتي يالاه ماتت، ولكن أجي حط يدك عليها وغتحيا».
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw dai ga hpe naw tsun nga yang, du wa ai mung up ai wa langai mi sa du nna, shi a man e dingnyawm dagup let, Nye a shayi sha ya sha si mat sai; raitimung, sa nna shi a ntsa e lata mara ya u, shaloi shi hkrung wa na ra ai, ngu wu ai.

Original: Jesus got up and went with him. So did his disciples.
Original Translation: وناض يسوع تبعه هو وتلامده.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi Yesu rawt nna shi hte shi a sape ni hkan nang ma ai.

Original: Just then a woman came up behind Jesus. She had a sickness that made her bleed. It had lasted for 12 years. She touched the edge of his clothes.
Original Translation: وكانت تم واحد المراة مريضة، طناشر عام وهي كتدوز بالدم، قربات ورا يسوع ومسات جلايله،
Translated Sentence: Dai shaloi e, shi a hpang de shi a asai ru ai numsha langai mi sa du nna, shi a hpun palawng shingkyit hpe ahtawk wu ai.

Original: She thought, "I only need to touch his clothes. Then I will be healed."
Original Translation: حيت ݣالت فخاطرها: «إلا مسيت غير حوايجه نتشافى».
Translated Sentence: Shi gaw, "Shi a hpun palawng hpe ngai ahtawk la lu na nngai, shaloi ngai mai na nngai, " nga nna myit nga ai.

Original: Jesus turned and saw her. "Dear woman, don't give up hope," he said. "Your faith has healed you." The woman was healed at that very moment.
Original Translation: وهو يتلفت يسوع وشافها وݣال: «تيقي آ بنتي، راه إيمانك شفاك». وفديك الساعة تشافات المراة.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw kayin yu nna, dai numsha hpe mu wu yang, "Numsha e, myit hkum daw, na a kamsham ai gaw nang hpe shamai ya nitdai", ngu wu ai. Dai shaloi jang dai numsha gaw mai mat wa ai.

Original: When Jesus entered the ruler's house, he saw the flute players there. And he saw the noisy crowd.
Original Translation: وملي وصل يسوع لدار الرئيس وشاف اللي كينوحو بالليرة والجماعة د الناس دايرين الصداع،
Translated Sentence: Ya Yesu gaw dai du wa a nta de shang wa nna, dai yang e sumpyi dum ai ni hte, jahtau ai shawa masha ni hpe mu wu ai.

Original: He said, "Go away. The girl is not dead. She is sleeping." But they laughed at him.
Original Translation: ݣال ليهم: «خرجو من هنا! البنت ما ماتتش، راها غير ناعسة!»، وهم يضحكو عليه.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw, "Nanhte pru wa marit; dai ma kaji gaw n si ai sha, yup pyaw nga ai, " ngu nna shanhte hpe tsun mu ai. Shanhte chyawm gaw shi hpe asawng asang di mu ai.

Original: After the crowd had been sent outside, Jesus went in. He took the girl by the hand, and she got up.
Original Translation: وملي خرجهم يسوع برا، دخل وشد البنت من يدها وهي تنوض.

Original: News about what Jesus had done spread all over that area. Jesus Heals Two Blind Men
Original Translation: وداعت الخبار فديك الجوايه كلها. يسوع كيشافي جوج د العميين
Translated Sentence: Yesu galaw ai lam gaw dai ginwang shara shagu hta kajai gumhkawng wa ai.

Original: When Jesus went indoors, the blind men came to him. He asked them, "Do you believe that I can do this?"  "Yes, Lord," they replied.
Original Translation: وملي دخل للدار، قربو لعنده العميين. وهو يسولهم يسوع: «واش كتآمنو بلي أنا قادر نشفيكم؟»، وجاوبوه: «إيه آ سيدي!».

Original Translation: وديك الساعة مس يسوع عينيهم وݣال: «على قد إيمانكم غادي يكون ليكم داكشي اللي بغيتو».
Translated Sentence: Shaloi shi gaw, Nanhte kamsham ai hte maren, nanhte a matu byin u ga, nga nna shanhte a myi hpe ahtawk wu ai.

Original: They could now see again. Jesus strongly warned them, "Be sure that no one knows about this."
Original Translation: وهم يتحلو ليهم عينيهم، ونهاهم يسوع وݣال: «عنداكم تݣولوها لشي حد!».
Translated Sentence: Shanhte myi bai mu lu ma ai rai nna, Yesu gaw, "Ndai lam kadai hpe mung hkum tsun dan myit!, " ngu nna shanhte hpe daru kau mu ai.

Original: But they went out and spread the news. They talked about him all over that area.
Original Translation: ولكن هم خرجو وبداو كيديعو الخبار فديك الجوايه كلها. زيزون كيتشافى
Translated Sentence: Rai ti mung shanhte pru wa nna dai shara shagu hta shi a lam hkaw dan ma ai.

Original: While they were going out, another man was brought to Jesus. A demon controlled him, and he could not speak.
Original Translation: وما جاو فين يخرجو العميين، حتى جابو ليه واحد الراجل زيزون ومسكون بالجنون.
Translated Sentence: Ya shanhte pru wa ma yang, nat kap ai masha kaga langai mi hpe Yesu hpang de woi sa mu ai rai nna, shi gaw n chye shaga lu ai.

Original: When the demon was driven out, the man spoke.  The crowd was amazed. They said, "Nothing like this has ever been seen in Israel."
Original Translation: وملي خرج يسوع الجن، هضر الزيزون. وهم يتعجبو الجماعات د الناس وݣالو: «عمرنا ما شفنا بحال هادشي فإسرائيل!».
Translated Sentence: Dai nat hpe shaden kau ai hpang, dai wa tsun lu wu ai rai nna, shawa masha ni mau mahka nga nna, Israela amyu hta ndai zawn re ai lam galoi mung n mu yu ga ai, nga ma ai.

Original: But the Pharisees said, "He drives out demons by the power of the prince of demons." There Are Only a Few Workers
Original Translation: أما الفريسيين ݣالو: «راه كيخرج الجنون برئيس الجنون!». متى 10‏:25؛ 12‏:24؛ مرقس 3‏:22؛ لوقا 11‏:15 المحنة ديال يسوع
Translated Sentence: Rai ti mung Hparishe ni gaw, "Shi gaw nat ni a agyi wa a atsam hte nat ni hpe shaden kau nga ai, " nga ma ai.

Original: Jesus went through all the towns and villages. He taught in their synagogues. He preached the good news of the kingdom. And he healed every illness and sickness.
Original Translation: وكان يسوع كيمشي لݣاع المدون والدواور كيعلم فديور الصلاة ديالهم وكيخبر بالبشارة ديال مملكة الله، وكيشافي كل علة وكل مرض. متى
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw mare kahtawng shagu hte mare kahtawng shagu hkan e sa hkawm let, shanhte a tara jawng ni hta sharin shaga let, mungdan a kabu gara shiga hkaw dan let, machyi makaw amyu myu hte machyi makaw amyu myu hpe shamai ya mu ai.

Original: When he saw the crowds, he felt deep concern for them. They were beaten down and helpless, like sheep without a shepherd.
Original Translation: وملي شاف الجماعات د الناس، حن عليهم حيت كانو معدبين ومشتتين بحال الغنم اللي ما عندها سراح. مرقس
Translated Sentence: Rĩrĩa onire kĩrĩndĩ kĩu, akĩmaiguĩra tha mũno tondũ nĩ maanyitirũo na makĩnyararwo, ta ngʼondu itarĩ na mũrĩithi.

Original: Then Jesus said to his disciples, "The harvest is huge. But there are only a few workers.
Original Translation: وهو يݣول لتلامده: «الحصاد كتير، ولكن الحصادا قلال. لوقا
Translated Sentence: Dai rai nna shi a sape ni hpe, "Nmai dan ai lam law law nga ai, rai ti mung galaw ai ni mahtang loi ma ai.

Original: So ask the Lord of the harvest to send workers out into his harvest field."
Original Translation: إيوا طلبو من مول الحصاد باش يصيفط الحصادا للحصاد دياله».
Translated Sentence: Dai re ai majaw shi a dan di ai mam madu hpe, shi a dan di ai mam hta amu galaw ai ni shangun dat na, hpyi mu, ngu nna shanhte hpe tsun mu ai.

Original Translation: الفصل العاشر يسوع كيصيفط تلامده الطناش
Translated Sentence: Jésus atokua adisciple bale-oko na use

Original: Jesus called for his 12 disciples to come to him. He gave them authority to drive out evil spirits and to heal every illness and sickness.
Original Translation: ومن بعد عيط يسوع على تلامده الطناش وعطاهم السلطة باش يخرجو الجنون ويشافيو الناس من كل علة ومن كل مرض.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi Yesu gaw shi a sape shi lahkawng hpe shaga la nna, nat ni hpe shaden kau lu na hte machyi makaw amyu myu hpe shamai ya lu na ahkang jaw mu ai.

Original: Here are the names of the 12 apostles. First are Simon Peter and his brother Andrew. Then come James, son of Zebedee, and his brother John.
Original Translation: وهادو هم السميات ديال الرسل الطناش: اللول فيهم سمعان المكني بطرس وخوه أندراوس، ويعقوب بن زبدي ويوحنا خوه،
Translated Sentence: Kasa shi lahkawng a amying gaw ndai rai nga ai: shawng na wa gaw Simun Petru hte shi a kanau Andre rai nga ai; hpang e Zebedi a kasha Yaku hte shi a kanau Yawhan rai nga ma ai.

Original: Next are Philip and Bartholomew, and also Thomas and Matthew the tax collector. Two more are James, son of Alphaeus, and Thaddaeus.
Original Translation: وفيلبس وبرتولماوس، وتوما، ومتى مول الضريبة، ويعقوب بن حلفى وتداوس،
Translated Sentence: Bai Hpilip hte Bartolome, Htawma hte kang hta ai wa Mahte hte, Alhpe a kasha Yaku hte Tade ngu ai yan mung,

Original: The last are Simon the Zealot and Judas Iscariot. Judas is the one who was later going to hand Jesus over to his enemies.
Original Translation: وسمعان الوطني، ويهودا الإسخريوطي اللي غيخون يسوع.
Translated Sentence: Dai hpang na ni gaw, Simun Hpara Hpara, Yuda Iskariot hte Yesu hpe ap kau na wa rai nga ai.

Original: Jesus sent these 12 out with the following orders. "Do not go among those who aren't Jews," he said. "Do not enter any town of the Samaritans.
Original Translation: وصيفط يسوع هاد الطناش ووصاهم وݣال: «ما تمشيوش لعند الشعوب اللي ماشي يهود وما تدخلوش لمدون السامريين،
Translated Sentence: Jésus envoya ces douze avec les instructions suivantes: " N'allez pas chez les non-Juifs, et n'entrez dans aucune ville des Samaritains.

Original: Instead, go to the people of Israel. They are like sheep that have become lost.
Original Translation: ولكن سيرو لعند الخرفان الموضرين اللي من شعب إسرائيل،
Translated Sentence: Dai hta n ga, Israela amyu masha ni gaw, kayin mat ai sagu zawn rai nga ma ai.

Original: As you go, preach this message, 'The kingdom of heaven is near.'
Original Translation: وفطريقكم خبرو الناس بلي الوقت ديال مملكة السماوات راه قرب.
Translated Sentence: Nanhte sa wa nga yang, 'Sumsing lamu a mungdan ni ni wa magang ra sai,' nga nna hkaw tsun nga mu.

Original: Heal those who are sick. Bring those who are dead back to life. Make those who have skin diseases 'clean' again. Drive out demons. You have received freely, so give freely.
Original Translation: شفيو المرضى، وحييو الموتى، وردو المجدامين طاهرين، وخرجو الجنون. خديتو بلاش إيوا عطيو بلاش.
Translated Sentence: Machyi ai ni hpe shamai ya mu, si ai ni hpe hkrung sharawt ya mu, shan machyi ai ni hpe shamai ya mu, nat ni hpe shaden kau mu. Nanhte gaw sha lu la manit dai, sha jaw mu.

Original: "Do not take along any gold, silver or copper in your belts.
Original Translation: ما تديو فجيوبكم لا دهب، لا فضة، لا نحاس،
Translated Sentence: Nanhte a shingkyit hta aja, gumhpraw, magri hkum hpai myit.

Original: Do not take a bag for the journey. Do not take extra clothes or sandals or walking sticks. A worker should be given what he needs.
Original Translation: لا رزمة، لا جوج لبسات، لا صباط، لا عكاز، علاحقاش الخدام كيستاهل ماكلته. 1كورنتوس 9‏:14؛ 1تيموتاوس 5‏:18
Translated Sentence: Lam de na matu, sumpan mung, hpun palawng mung, kyepdin mung, hpunpyen mung hkum la myit: amu galaw ai wa gaw, shi ra ai hte maren sha lu la na ra ai.

Original: "When you enter a town or village, look for someone who is willing to welcome you. Stay at that person's house until you leave.
Original Translation: والمدينة ولا الدوار اللي دخلتو ليهم، سولو على شي حد يستاهل يضايفكم، وبقاو عنده حتى تمشيو بحالكم.
Translated Sentence: Nanhte mare langai ngai hta, shing n rai kahtawng langai ngai hta shang myit yang, dai mare kaw na pru wa ai du hkra, dai wa kaw nga nga mu.

Original: As you enter the home, greet those who live there.
Original Translation: وإلا دخلتو لشي دار، سلمو على ماليها.
Translated Sentence: Nta langai mi hta shang yang, dai nta masha ni hpe shakram ya mu.

Original: If that home welcomes you, give it your blessing of peace. If it does not, don't bless it.
Original Translation: وإلا كانو مالين الدار يستاهلو سلامكم، سلامكم يوصل ليهم. وإلا ما كانوش يستاهلوه، سلامكم يرجع ليكم.
Translated Sentence: Dai nta e nanhte hpe hkap hkalum la myit yang gaw, nanhte a ngwi pyaw ai lam hpe, dai nta hpe jaw mu; n hkap hkalum la myit yang gaw, hkum jaw myit.

Original: "Some people may not welcome you or listen to your words. If they don't, shake the dust off your feet when you leave that home or town.
Original Translation: وإلا ما قبلوكمش مالين شي دار ولا شي مدينة ولا ما سمعوش لكلامكم، خرجو من تم وسوسو الغبرة اللي فرجليكم. الاعمال
Translated Sentence: Nanhte hpe n hkap hkalum la ai ni hte nanhte a ga n madat ai ni nga ma yang gaw, dai nta shing n rai mare kaw nna pru wa yang, nanhte a lagaw nhpang na nhpu hpe kabai kau mu.

Original: What I'm about to tell you is true. On judgment day it will be easier for Sodom and Gomorrah than for that town.
Original Translation: نݣول ليكم الحق: راه حالة أرض سدوم وعمورة فيوم الحساب غادي تكون خف من حالة ديك المدينة». لوقا 10‏:4‏-12 التعدو اللي جاي
Translated Sentence: Nanhte hpe ngai teng teng tsun made ga, Tara dara ai nhtoi hta, dai mare hta Sodom hte Gomora mare gaw grau nna hkam la na ra ai.

Original: "I am sending you out like sheep among wolves. So be as wise as snakes and as harmless as doves.
Original Translation: «هاني كنصيفطكم بحال الخرفان بين الدياب، إيوا كونو على بال بحال اللفاعي، وضريفين بحال الحمام. لوقا
Translated Sentence: Yu mu, nanhte hpe chyahkyawn ni a ka-ang de sagu zawn shangun dat made ai: dai re ai majaw lapu zawn hpaji rawng nna hkrudu zawn san seng ai rai nga mu.

Original: "Watch out! Men will hand you over to the local courts. They will whip you in their synagogues.
Original Translation: وردو بالكم من الناس، حيت غادي يديوكم للمحاكم، وفديور الصلاة ديالهم غيضربوكم، مرقس
Translated Sentence: "Masha ni nanhte hpe tara rung ni de ap kau nna, shanhte a tara jawng ni hta kayat na mara ai majaw, sadi nga mu.

Original: You will be brought to governors and kings because of me. You will be witnesses to them and to those who aren't Jews.
Original Translation: وغيجروكم قدام الحكام والملوك على قبلي، باش تشهدو لي قدامهم وقدام الشعوب اللي ماشي يهود.
Translated Sentence: Nanhte gaw nye a amying nsang majaw munggyi ni hte hkawhkam ni a man e woi wa ai hkrum na marin dai. Dai gaw shanhte hte maigan amyu ni a man e sakse tai na matu rai nga ai.

Original: "But when they arrest you, don't worry about what you will say or how you will say it. At that time you will be given the right words to say.
Original Translation: وملي يديوكم ما ترفدوش الهم لا كيفاش ولا آش غادي تݣولو، حيت ديك الساعة غادي يتعطاكم آش غتݣولو.
Translated Sentence: Nanhte hpe rim la myit yang gaw, kaning ngu tsun na hte kaning ngu tsun na lam, hkum myit myit myit; kaning ngu tsun na lam, dai ahkying hta nanhte hpe jaw na marin dai.

Original: It will not be you speaking. The Spirit of your Father will be speaking through you.
Original Translation: علاحقاش ماشي نتم اللي غادي تهضرو، ولكن الروح ديال باكم اللي فالسما هو اللي غادي يعطيكم الكلام اللي تݣولوه.
Translated Sentence: Nanhte tsun ai gaw nanhte n rai, nanhte a Kawa a Wenyi she nanhte a n-gup hte tsun na ra ai.

Original: "Brothers will hand over brothers to be killed. Fathers will hand over their children. Children will rise up against their parents and have them put to death.
Original Translation: الخو غيسلم خوه باش يتقتل، والبو غيسلم ولده باش يتقتل، والولاد غينوضو ضد والديهم وغيقتلوهم، مرقس
Translated Sentence: Hpunau wa gaw hpunau wa hpe sat kau na matu, kawa wa gaw kasha hpe ap kau na ra ai; kashu kasha ni mung kanu kawa ni hpe gumlau nna sat kau na mara ai.

Original: Everyone will hate you because of me. But anyone who stands firm to the end will be saved.
Original Translation: وغيكرهوكم ݣاع الناس على ود الإسم ديالي. ولكن اللي بقى تابت حتى للخر غينجا. متى
Translated Sentence: Nye a amying nsang majaw masha nlang hte nanhte hpe ndawng na mara ai: raitimung, jahtum du hkra shakut sharang ai wa gaw, hkyehkrang la ai hkrum na ra ai.

Original: "When people attack you in one place, escape to another. What I'm about to tell you is true. You will not finish going through the cities of Israel before the Son of Man comes.
Original Translation: ولكن ملي يتعداو عليكم فشي مدينة، هربو لوحدة خرى. راني نݣول ليكم الحق: ما تجيو فين تضورو على مدون إسرائيل كلهم حتى يجي ولد الإنسان».
Translated Sentence: Nanhte hpe shara langai mi hta gasat na mara ai shaloi, kaga shara de hprawng wa mu. Nanhte gaw Israela mare ni hpe lai wa hkra n lai wa lu hkra, dai Masha Kasha du na ra ai.

Original: "A student is not better than his teacher. A servant is not better than his master.
Original Translation: «راه التلميد ماشي حسن من المعلم دياله، ولا الخدام حسن من سيده. لوقا
Translated Sentence: Sape gaw shi a sara hta grau ai n rai; mayam mung shi a madu hta grau ai n rai.

Original: It is enough for the student to be like his teacher. And it is enough for the servant to be like his master. If the head of the house has been called Beelzebub, what can the others who live there expect?
Original Translation: بركا على التلميد إلا كان بحال المعلم دياله، والخدام بحال سيده. وإلا سماو مول الدار بعلزبول، إيوا شنو غيسميو مالين داره؟ متى 9‏:34؛ 12‏:24؛ مرقس 3‏:22؛ لوقا 11‏:15
Translated Sentence: Sape wa gaw shi a sara hte maren rai wa lu ai hte, mayam wa mung shi a madu hte maren rai wa lu ai gaw, dai hte sha ra nga ai. Nta madu hpe Beelsebul ngu nna shamying ma yang gaw, dai nta masha ni hpa rai myit mada lu na mara ta?

Original: "So don't be afraid of your enemies. Everything that is secret will be brought out into the open. Everything that is hidden will be uncovered.
Original Translation: ما تخافوش منهم، علاحقاش ݣاع اللي مستور غادي يتعرى، وݣاع اللي مخبي غادي يبان. مرقس
Translated Sentence: فَلَا تَخَافُوا مِنْ أَعْدَائِكُمْ. لِأَنَّ كُلَّ مَكْتُومٍ لَا يُعْلَنُ ، وَلَا مَخْفُوفٍ لَا يُعْلَنُ.

Original: What I tell you in the dark, speak in the daylight. What is whispered in your ear, shout from the rooftops.
Original Translation: وعلى داكشي، اللي ݣلت ليكم فالليل، ݣولوه فالنهار. وݣاع داكشي اللي سمعتوه فالسر، برحو بيه من فوق السطوح.
Translated Sentence: Nanhte hpe nsin hta ngai tsun ai lam hpe, nhtoi hta tsun mu; nanhte a na hta tsun dan ai lam hpe, nta ntsa e nna jahtau mu.

Original: Do not be afraid of those who kill the body but can't kill the soul. Instead, be afraid of the One who can destroy both soul and body in hell.
Original Translation: ما تخافوش من هادوك اللي كيقتلو الدات وما يقدروش يقتلو الروح، ولكن خافو من هاداك اللي قادر يهلك الروح والدات بجوجهم فجهنم.
Translated Sentence: Dai hta kaga, hkum hkrang hpe sat kau timung, myit masin hpe n sat lu ai ni hpe hkum hkrit myit: myit masin hte hkum hkrang hpe mung, wan nhkut hta jahten kau lu ai wa hpe hkrit nga mu.

Original: "Aren't two sparrows sold for only a penny? But not one of them falls to the ground without your Father knowing it.
Original Translation: ياك جوج طيور كيتباعو بدرهم واحد! وليني ما غيطيح حتى واحد فيهم فالأرض من غير إلا بغا باكم اللي فالسما.
Translated Sentence: "Munggawk lahkawng gaw gumhpraw lap mi sha dut ai n rai ni? Rai ti mung nanhte a Kawa n chye ai sha, langai mi muk n hkrat wa na ra ai.

Original: He even counts every hair on your head!
Original Translation: أما نتم حتى شعر راسكم راه كله محسوب.
Translated Sentence: Chiar şi fiecare păr de pe cap îţi numără!

Original: So don't be afraid. You are worth more than many sparrows.
Original Translation: إيوا بلا ما تخافو، راكم حسن من بزاف د الطيور.
Translated Sentence: Dai re ai majaw hkum hkrit myit; nanhte gaw hkrudu law law hta grau manu dan nga myit dai.

Original: "What about someone who says in front of others that he knows me? I will also say in front of my Father who is in heaven that I know him.
Original Translation: اللي غيعترف بي قدام الناس، غنعترف بيه حتى أنا قدام با اللي فالسماوات.
Translated Sentence: Masha ni a man e ngai hpe nyet kau ai wa hpe, ngai mung sumsing lamu e nga ai nye Wa a man e nyet kau na we ai.

Original: But what about someone who says in front of others that he doesn't know me? I will say in front of my Father who is in heaven that I don't know him.
Original Translation: ولكن اللي غينكرني قدام الناس، حتى أنا غنكره قدام با اللي فالسماوات». 2تيموتاوس 2‏:12 ماشي الهنا ولكن السيف
Translated Sentence: Rai ti mung masha ni a man e ngai hpe nyet kau ai wa gaw, sumsing lamu e nga ai nye Wa a man e ngai nyet kau na we ai.

Original: "Do not think that I came to bring peace to the earth. I didn't come to bring peace. I came to bring a sword.
Original Translation: «عنداك يحساب ليكم بلي جيت باش ندير الهنا على الأرض، راه ما جبتش الهنا ولكن جبت السيف.

Original Translation: وكون فهمتو المعنى ديال الآية اللي كتݣول: بغيت الرحمة ماشي الدبيحة، كون ݣاع ما حكمتو على اللي ما عليهم لوم.

Original Translation: ولقا واحد الراجل يده مشلولة. وهم يسولوه وݣالو: «واش حلال الشفا نهار السبت؟» سولوه باش يلقاو عليه شي تهمة.

Original: He said to them, "What if one of your sheep falls into a pit on the Sabbath? Won't you take hold of it and lift it out?
Original Translation: وجاوبهم: «إلا شي واحد فيكم عنده خروف واحد وطاح ليه فحفرة نهار السبت، واش ما غيقبطوش ويهزه ويخرجه؟ لوقا

Translated Sentence: Masha gaw sagu hta grau manu dan nga ai. Dai rai nna, laban nhtoi hta mai kaja ai amu galaw na ahkang lu nga ai, ngu nna shanhte hpe tsun mu ai.

Original: Then Jesus said to the man, "Stretch out your hand." So he stretched it out. It was as good as new, just as good as the other hand.
Original Translation: وݣال يسوع للراجل اللي يده مشلولة: «مد يدك!» ومدها، وهي تولي صحيحة بحال اليد لخرى.
Translated Sentence: ثُمَّ قَالَ لِلرَّجُلِ: " مُدَّ يَدَكَ ". فَمَدَّهَا ، فَكَانَتْ جَدِيدَةً كَٱلْيَدِ ٱلْآخَرَةِ.

Original: But the Pharisees went out and planned how to kill Jesus. God's Chosen Servant
Original Translation: وخرجو الفريسيين كيتافقو كيفاش يقتلوه. يسوع هو المختار من الله
Translated Sentence: Rai ti mung Hparishe ni pru wa nna, Yesu hpe sat kau na lam bawng ma ai.

Original: Jesus knew all about the Pharisees' plans. So he left that place. Many followed him, and he healed all their sick people.
Original Translation: وملي ساق يسوع الخبار، مشى من تم وتبعوه جماعات كتار من الناس، وشفاهم كلهم.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw dai shara na pru wa nna, shanhte a hpaji daw ai lam chye wu ai rai nna, masha wunawng wuwa kaba shi kaw hkan nang ma ai rai nna, shanhte machyi ai ni nlang hte hpe shi shamai ya mu ai.

Original Translation: ووصاهم باش ما يخبرو حد عليه.
Translated Sentence: Shi gaw shi kadai re ai hpe n tsun dan lu na matu shanhte hpe sadi jaw mu ai.

Original: This was to make what was spoken through the prophet Isaiah come true. It says,
Original Translation: باش يتحقق الكلام اللي ݣال النبي إشعيا:
Translated Sentence: Dai lam gaw myihtoi Esaia a ga dik wa na matu rai nga ai:

Original: "Here is my servant. I have chosen him.  He is the one I love. I am very pleased with him.  I will put my Spirit on him.  He will announce to the nations that everything will be made right.
Original Translation: «ها هو عبدي اللي ختاريت،  العزيز ديالي اللي بيه نفسي فرحات بزاف.  غادي نحط عليه روحي،  وغيخبر الشعوب بالحق.
Translated Sentence: "Ngai lata la ai nye a shangun ma gaw, shi rai nga ai. Ngai tsawra ai wa shi rai nga ai. Shi hta nye a myit sharawng awng nga ai. Ngai shi hpe nye a Wenyi jaw na nngai. Shi gaw maigan amyu ni hpe dinghpring ai lam hkaw tsun dan na ra ai.

Original: He will not argue or cry out.  No one will hear his voice in the streets.
Original Translation: ما غيتخاصم وما غيغوت،  حتى حد ما غيسمع صوته فالزناقي.
Translated Sentence: Shi gaw ndang kalang hkat na n rai, jahtau na mung n rai, mare lam ni hta shi a nsen na na mung n lu na ma ai.

Original: He will not break a bent twig.  He will not put out a dimly burning flame.  He will make everything right.
Original Translation: قصبة مشقوقة ما غيهرس،  وفتيلة كتطلق الدخان ما غيطفي،  حتى يرد الحق هو اللي غالب.
Translated Sentence: Shi gaw, gawngkya ai lakung lakying hpe n daw kau na ra ai; wan shinglet hpe mung, n shamyit na ra ai: shi gaw yawng mayawng hpe shading sharai ya na ra ai.

Original: The nations will put their hope in him." (Isaiah 42:1-4) Jesus and Beelzebub
Original Translation: وفالإسم دياله غيديرو الشعوب رجاهم». يسوع وبعلزبول

Original: A man controlled by demons was brought to Jesus. The man was blind and could not speak. Jesus healed him. Then the man could speak and see.
Original Translation: وجابو شي ناس ليسوع واحد الراجل عمى وزيزون وساكنه جن، وهو يشافيه، وهكا ولى قادر يتكلم ويشوف.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi nat kap ai myi kyaw ai hte n chye shaga ai wa hpe Yesu hpang de woi sa mu ai. Yesu gaw dai wa hpe shamai ya wu ai rai nna, shi ga shaga nna mu lu wu ai.

Original Translation: وتعجبو الجماعات د الناس وݣالو: «ياكما هادا هو بن داود؟».

Original Translation: وملي سمعو الفريسيين هادشي ݣالو: «هادا راه ما كيخرج الجنون غير ببعلزبول رئيس الجنون». متى 9‏:34؛ 10‏:25

Original: Jesus knew what they were thinking. So he said to them, "Every kingdom that fights against itself will be destroyed. Every city or family that is divided against itself will not stand.
Original Translation: وعرف يسوع فاش كيفكرو وݣال ليهم: «كل مملكة كتقسم كتخرب، وكل مدينة ولا عائلة كتقسم ما غتدومش.
Translated Sentence: Shanhte a myit mang ai lam Yesu chye wu ai rai nna, shi shanhte hpe, Tinang hte tinang a hpyen maga de daw hkat ai mungdan shagu hten mat na ra ai; tinang a hpyen maga de daw hkat ai mare shagu hte nta shagu mung, agrin nga lu na n rai.

Original: If Satan drives out Satan, he fights against himself. Then how can his kingdom stand?
Original Translation: إيوا إلا كان الشيطان كيخرج الشيطان، غادي يكون الشيطان تقسم وولى ضد راسه، وإلا تقسم وولى ضد راسه كيفاش غادي تبقى مملكته تابتة؟

Original: You say I drive out demons by the power of Beelzebub. Then by whose power do your people drive them out? So then, they will be your judges.
Original Translation: وإلا كنت أنا ببعلزبول كنخرج الجنون، إيوا شكون هادا اللي ولادكم كيخرجوهم بيه؟ على هادشي راه ولادكم اللي غادي يحكمو عليكم.

Original: But suppose I drive out demons by the Spirit of God. Then God's kingdom has come to you.
Original Translation: ولكن إلا كنت أنا بروح الله كنخرج الجنون، راه مملكة الله جات فوسط منكم.

Original Translation: اللي ماشي معاي راه ضدي، واللي ما كيجمعش معاي راه كيفرق. مرقس 9‏:40

Translated Sentence: Masha Kasha a lam n hkru n hkra ai ga tsun ai wa kadai mung mara raw ya lu na ra ai; chyoi pra ai Wenyi hpe n hkru n hkra ai ga tsun ai wa chyawm gaw, mara raw ya lu na n rai: dai wa gaw ya mung, hpang jahtum na nhtoi hta mung, mara raw ya lu na n rai.

Original: "If you make a tree good, its fruit will be good. If you make a tree bad, its fruit will be bad. You can tell a tree by its fruit.
Original Translation: «غرسو شجرة مزيانة وغتكون غلتها مزيانة، ولا غرسو شجرة خايبة وغتكون غلتها خايبة. راه من الغلة كتعرف الشجرة. متى
Translated Sentence: "Kachin hpun hpe kaja ai hpun shatai myit yang, dai hpun a asi mung kaja nga ai; hpun hpe n kaja ai hpun shatai myit yang, dai hpun a asi mung n kaja nga ai: hpun hpe dai hpun a asi hte chye lu ai.

Original Translation: آ تريكة اللفاعي! كيفاش تقدرو تݣولو شي كلام مزيان ونتم ما مزيانينش؟ راه داكشي اللي كيخرج من القلب كيتكلم بيه الفم. متى
Translated Sentence: Nanhte gaw n hkru ai ni rai nga myit dai rai nna, kaja ai ga kaning rai tsun lu na rai ta? Nanhte a n-gup gaw nanhte a kraw lawang hta rawng ai hte maren tsun nga ai.

Original Translation: بنادم المزيان كيخرج الحوايج المزيانين من الكنز المزيان اللي فقلبه، وبنادم الخايب كيخرج الحوايج الخايبين من الكنز الخايب اللي فقلبه.

Original Translation: ونݣول ليكم: راه كل هضرة خاوية كيݣولوها الناس، غادي يتحاسبو عليها فيوم الحساب.

Original Translation: وكيمشي وكيدي معاه سبعة ديال الجنون خرين شر منه. وملي كيدخلو كيسكنو تم، وكتولي حالة هاداك بنادم اللخرانية كفس من حالته اللولانية. هادشي اللي غادي يطرا لهاد الجيل اللي كيدير الشر حتى هو». خوت يسوع ومه

Original Translation: ولكن اللي كيطيعو الله غيضويو بحال الشمس فمملكة باهم. إيوا اللي عنده شي ودنين، يسمع!» المتال ديال الكنز والجوهرة والشبكة
Translated Sentence: Dai shaloi e, Karai Kasang a masha ni gaw, shanhte a Kawa a mungdan hta jan zawn htoi nga na mara ai. Dai rai nna, na lu ai wa gaw madat la u ga.

Original: "The kingdom of heaven is like treasure that was hidden in a field. When a man found it, he hid it again. He was very happy. So he went and sold everything he had. And he bought that field.
Original Translation: «وكتشبه مملكة السماوات عاوتاني لواحد الكنز مدفون فواحد الفدان لقاه واحد الراجل وعاود دفنه، ومن كترة الفرحة دياله مشى باع كل ما كيملك وشرا داك الفدان.
Translated Sentence: "Sumsing lamu a mungdan gaw, yi hkauna hta makoi da ai sutgan hte bung nga ai. Masha langai mi dai hpe mu hkrup nhtawm, bai makoi da wu ai. Dai majaw shi kabu gara ai myit hte sa wa nna shi lu malu dut kau nna dai yi hkauna hpe mari la wu ai.

Original: "Again, the kingdom of heaven is like a trader who was looking for fine pearls.
Original Translation: وكتشبه مملكة السماوات عاوتاني لواحد التاجر كان كيقلب على الجوهر الصافي،
Translated Sentence: Bai, sumsing lamu a mungdan gaw, tsawm htap ai lungseng tam ai hpaga ga ai wa hte bung nga ai.

Original: He found one that was very valuable. So he went away and sold everything he had. And he bought that pearl. The Story of the Net
Original Translation: وملي لقا واحد الجوهرة غالية بزاف، مشى باع كل ما كيملك وشراها».
Translated Sentence: Encontró una que era muy valiosa, así que se fue y vendió todo lo que tenía y compró esa perla.

Original: "Again, the kingdom of heaven is like a net. It was let down into the lake. It caught all kinds of fish.
Original Translation: «وكتشبه مملكة السماوات عاوتاني لواحد الشبكة رماوها الصيادا فالبحر، وجمعات الحوت من كل نوع.
Translated Sentence: Bai, sumsing lamu a mungdan gaw, nawng hta kabai bang ai sumgawn hte bung nga ai rai nna, nga amyu myu hpe rim la wu ai.

Original: When it was full, the fishermen pulled it up on the shore. Then they sat down and gathered the good fish into baskets. But they threw the bad fish away.
Original Translation: وملي عمرات، خرجوها الصيادا لجنب البحر وݣلسو وبداو كيعزلو، اللي مزيان داروه فالسلل واللي ما صالح لوالو رماوه.
Translated Sentence: Dai gaw hpring chyat jang, dai hpe hkarang de dun la nhtawm, dung nga ma ai hte, kaja ai ni hpe gawt ni hta jahkrat nhtawm, n kaja ai ni hpe kabai kau mu ai.

Original: This is how it will be on judgment day. The angels will come. They will separate the people who did what is wrong from those who did what is right.
Original Translation: وهكا غادي يكون فاللخر ديال الزمان: غادي يجيو الملايكة ويعزلو المدنبين من بين اللي متاقيين الله،
Translated Sentence: Tara dara ai nhtoi hta mung dai hte maren rai na ra ai: lamu kasa ni sa nna, n hkru ai amu galaw ai ni hpe, dinghpring ai amu galaw ai ni kaw na, karan kau na mara ai.

Original: They will throw the evil people into the blazing furnace. There the evil ones will sob and grind their teeth.
Original Translation: ويرميو المدنبين فالزوبية د العافية، تم فين غادي يكون البكا وتغزاز السنان». الكنز الجديد والقديم
Translated Sentence: И бросят их в огонь, где будут плакать и gnashing зубы.

Original: "Do you understand all these things?" Jesus asked.  "Yes," they replied.
Original Translation: وسول يسوع تلامده وݣال: «واش فهمتو هادشي كله؟» وجاوبوه: «إيه!»،
Translated Sentence: Jésus ahunda ala, lo tene: "Ala hinga ye so kue?" Ala kiri tënë: "E hinga".

Original: He said to them, "Every teacher of the law who has been taught about the kingdom of heaven is like the owner of a house. He brings new treasures out of his storeroom as well as old ones." A Prophet Without Honor
Original Translation: وهو يݣول ليهم: «إيوا راه على هادشي، كل واحد من العلما د الشرع عرف مملكة السماوات، كيشبه لشي مول الدار اللي كيخرج من الكنز دياله كل حاجة جديدة وقديمة». الناصرة ما قبلاتش يسوع
Translated Sentence: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ: "كُلُّ عَالِمٍ لِلْكِتَابِ مُتَعَلِّمٍ عَنْ مَلَكُوتِ ٱلسَّمَاوَاتِ يُشْبِهُ صَاحِبَ بَيْتٍ يَخْرُجُ مِنْ خَزَائِنِهِ خَزَائِنَ جَدِيدَةً وَقَ

Original: Jesus finished telling these stories. Then he moved on from there.
Original Translation: وملي كمل يسوع هاد المتول، مشى من تم.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw dai ga shadawn ni hpe tsun ngut jang, dai shara kaw na pru mat wa ai.

Original: He came to his hometown of Nazareth. There he began teaching the people in their synagogue. They were amazed.  "Where did this man get this wisdom? Where did he get this power to do miracles?" they asked.
Original Translation: ورجع لمدينته الناصرة، كيعلم الناس فديور الصلاة حتى تعجبو وبداو كيسولو: «منين جاته هاد الحكمة وهاد المعجزات؟
Translated Sentence: Shi a buga Nazaret de du nna, shanhte a tara jawng hta sharin shaga nga ai rai nna, shanhte mau mahka nga nna, Ndai wa gaw, ndai hpaji byeng-ya hte ndai lamik kumla galaw ai atsam kanang na lu la nu ta? nga nna tsun ma ai.

Original: "Isn't this the carpenter's son? Isn't his mother's name Mary? Aren't his brothers James, Joseph, Simon and Judas?
Original Translation: واش ماشي هادا هو ولد النجار؟ واش ماشي مه هي اللي سميتها مريم، وخوته هم يعقوب ويوسف وسمعان ويهودا؟
Translated Sentence: Ndai wa gaw hpun kawa a kasha n rai ni? shi a kanu gaw Mari ngu ai wa n rai ni? shi a kahpu kanau ni gaw Yaku, Yosep, Simun hte Yuda rai nga ma ai, n rai ni?

Original: Aren't all his sisters with us? Then where did this man get all these things?"
Original Translation: واش ماشي ݣاع خواتاته ساكنين فمدينتنا؟ إيوا منين جاه هادشي كله؟»
Translated Sentence: का ओकर जम्मो बहिनीमन हमर संग नइं हवंय? त ए जम्मो ला ओह कहां ले पाईस?"

Original: They were not pleased with him at all.  But Jesus said to them, "A prophet is not honored in his hometown. He doesn't receive any honor in his own home."
Original Translation: وما عجبهمش الحال، ولكن يسوع ݣال ليهم: «النبي كيتحترم فكل بلاصة من غير فبلاده، وفوسط عائلته» يوحنا 4‏:44 .
Translated Sentence: Shanhte gaw shi hpe n ra sharawng ma ai. Rai ti mung Yesu gaw, "Myihtoi langai mi gaw tinang a buga hte tinang a buga hta n hkungga ai sha, n hkungga ai sha, nga ai, " ngu nna shanhte hpe tsun mu ai.

Original: He did only a few miracles there because they had no faith.
Original Translation: وما دارش فديك البلاصة بزاف ديال المعجزات حيت ما عندهم إيمان.
Translated Sentence: Shanhte n kam n sham ma ai majaw, dai yang e lamik kumla loi mi sha galaw wu ai.

Translated Sentence: Vakasalai na Uluna i Joni na Dauveipapitaisotaki

Original: At that time Herod, the ruler of Galilee and Perea, heard reports about Jesus.
Original Translation: وفداك الوقت، سمع هيرودس الحاكم بخبار يسوع،
Translated Sentence: Dai aten e Galile mung hte Pere mung na Herod ngu ai munggyi wa gaw, Yesu a lam na wu ai.

Original: He said to his attendants, "This is John the Baptist. He has risen from the dead! That is why he has the power to do miracles."
Original Translation: وهو يݣول للخداما دياله: «هادا راه يوحنا المعمدان اللي تبعت من الموت، داكشي علاش المعجزات كيتدارو على يديه».
Translated Sentence: وَقَالَ لِخَدَمِهِ: "هَذَا يُوحَنَّا ٱلْمَعْمَدَانُ قَامَ مِنَ ٱلْأَمْوَاتِ ، لِذَلِكَ تُعْمَلُ فِيهِ ٱلْقُوَّاتُ".

Original: Herod had arrested John. He had tied him up and put him in prison because of Herodias. She was the wife of Herod's brother Philip.
Original Translation: حيت هيرودس كان قبط يوحنا وكتفه ودخله للحبس على قبل هيروديا مراة خوه فيلبس. لوقا
Translated Sentence: Kaning rai nme law, Herod gaw, Herod a kanau Hpilip a madu jan Herodia a majaw, Yawhan hpe rim la nna gyit da nhtawm, htawng hta sharen da nu ai.

Original: John had been saying to Herod, "It is against the Law for you to have her."
Original Translation: علاحقاش يوحنا كان كيݣول ليه: «ماشي حلال عليك باش تزوجها».
Translated Sentence: Yawhan gaw, "Nang dai numsha hpe lu la na gaw tara hte n seng ai", ngu nna Herod hpe tsun nga ai.

Original: Herod wanted to kill John. But he was afraid of the people, because they thought John was a prophet.
Original Translation: وكان باغي يقتله، ولكن خاف من الشعب حيت كانو كيآمنو بلي هو نبي.
Translated Sentence: Herod gaw Yawhan hpe sat kau mayu timung, masha ni hpe hkrit nga ai: kaning rai nme law, Yawhan gaw myihtoi rai nga ai, nga nna shanhte nawn ma ai.

Original: On Herod's birthday the daughter of Herodias danced for Herod and his guests. She pleased Herod very much.
Original Translation: وفالحفلة د عيد الميلاد ديال هيرودس، شطحات بنت هيروديا فالحفلة، وعجبات هيرودس.
Translated Sentence: Dai rai nna Herod a shangai nhtoi nhtoi du jang, Herodi a shayi sha gaw, Herod hte shi a manam ni a man e mahkawn mangoi nga ai rai nna, dai gaw Herod hpe kabu shangun wu ai.

Original: So he promised with an oath to give her anything she asked for.
Original Translation: وهادشي علاش حلف حتى يعطيها داكشي اللي طلبات.
Translated Sentence: Dai rai nna shi gaw dagam da nna, shi hpyi ai lam shagu shi hpe jaw na nga, ga ndat da wu ai.

Original: Her mother told her what to say. So the girl said to Herod, "Give me the head of John the Baptist on a big plate."
Original Translation: وحيت وصاتها مها آش تدير، ݣالت لهيرودس: «جيب لي دابا راس يوحنا المعمدان فطبسيل!».
Translated Sentence: Shi a kanu shi hpe tsun dan wu ai rai nna, dai numsha gaw, Hkalup Sara Yawhan a baw gaw, dai shakum hta ngai hpe jaw ya mi, ngu nna Herod hpe hpyi wu ai.

Original: The king was very upset. But he thought of his promise and his dinner guests. So he told one of his men to give her what she asked for.
Original Translation: وحزن الملك، ولكن على قبل الحلوف اللي حلف والناس اللي حاضرين آمر باش يتعطى ليها داكشي اللي بغات.
Translated Sentence: Hkawhkam wa chyawm gaw myit n pyaw nga ai rai nna, shi a ga ndat hte shi a manam ni hpe dum wu ai majaw, shi a mayam langai mi hpe shi hpyi ai hte maren jaw na, shi hpe hkangda wu ai.

Original: Herod had John's head cut off in the prison.
Original Translation: وصيفط اللي يقطع راس يوحنا فالحبس،
Translated Sentence: Herod gaw, htawng hta e Yawhan a baw kran kau wu ai.

Original: His head was brought in on a big plate and given to the girl. She then carried it to her mother.
Original Translation: وجابوه فواحد الطبسيل وعطاوه للبنت، وداته لمها.
Translated Sentence: Mũtwe wake waciikĩrio mbica-inĩ nene, ũkĩheagwo mũirĩtu ũcio, nake akĩũruta kũrĩ nyina.

Original: John's disciples came and took his body and buried it. Then they went and told Jesus. Jesus Feeds the Five Thousand
Original Translation: وجاو تلامد يوحنا، وهزو الدات دياله ودفنوها، ومن بعد مشاو وخبرو يسوع. يسوع كيوكل خمسالاف واحد
Translated Sentence: Shaloi Yawhan a sape ni sa nna shi a moi mang hpe la nhtawm lup makoi da mu ai rai nna, Yesu hpe sa tsun dan mu ai.

Original: Jesus heard what had happened to John. He wanted to be alone. So he went in a boat to a quiet place. The crowds heard about this. They followed him on foot from the towns.
Original Translation: وملي سمع يسوع هاد الأمور، مشى من تم فالفلوكة لواحد الموضع خالي بوحده. وملي عرفو الجماعات د الناس بلي هو غادي لتم، تبعوه من المدون على رجليهم.
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw Yawhan a lam na wu yang, shi hkrai rai mayu ai majaw, dai li hta shang nna, nammukdara na shara de sa wa ai. Masha wunawng wuwa ni dai lam na jang, mare ni kaw nna lagaw hte hkan nang ma ai.

Original: When it was almost evening, the disciples came to him. "There is nothing here," they said. "It's already getting late. Send the crowds away. They can go and buy some food in the villages."
Original Translation: وملي جات العشية، قربو ليه تلامده وݣالو ليه: «راه مشى الحال وحنا فهاد الخلا، إيوا ݣول للجماعات د الناس يمشيو للدواور باش يشريو لراسهم الماكلة».
Translated Sentence: Ya shana de du magang wa jang, sape ni shi kaw sa du nna, Ndai shara gaw, shara n nga ai; ahkying mung hkoi wa sai; masha wunawng wuwa ni hpe shabawn dat u; shanhte gaw kahtawng hkan e lusha mari la lu mu ga, ngu mu ai.

Original Translation: ولكن يسوع ݣال ليهم: «ما كاين لاش يمشيو، عطيوهم نتم ما ياكلو».
Translated Sentence: Yesu gaw, " Shanhte pru wa na lam n nga ai; nanhte shanhte hpe sha na jaw mu, " ngu nna shanhte hpe htan mu ai.

Original Translation: وݣالو ليه: «راه ما عندنا هنا غير خمسة د الخبزات وجوج حوتات».
Translated Sentence: Shanhte gaw, Anhte hta muk manga hte nga lahkawng sha nga nga ai, ngu nna htan mu ai.

Original Translation: وݣال ليهم: «أراوهم لي لهنا!».

Original Translation: وهو يآمر الجماعات د الناس باش يݣلسو على الربيع. وخدا هادوك الخمسة د الخبزات والجوج د الحوتات وهز عينيه للسما وشكر الله. وملي قطع الخبزات عطى لتلامده، والتلامد عطاو للجماعات ديال الناس.
Translated Sentence: Shaloi shawa masha ni hpe tsingdu ntsa e dung nga na hkangda wu ai rai nna, dai muk manga hte nga lahkawng la nhtawm, sumsing lamu de mada yu let, chyeju dum wu ai rai nna, muk ahkyep alep nhtawm, sape ni hpe jaw mu ai rai nna, sape ni mung shawa masha ni hpe karan jaw mu ai.

Original Translation: وكانو هادوك اللي كلاو شي خمسالاف واحد، من غير العيالات والولاد. يسوع كيتمشى فوق الما
Translated Sentence: Sha ai masha ni gaw numsha ma kaji ni hte rau marai manga daram rai ma ai. Yesu gaw hka ntsa e hkawm sa wa nna,

Original Translation: وآمر يسوع تلامده باش يركبو ديك الساعة فالفلوكة ويسبقوه للجهة لخرى، على ما يصيفط الجماعات د الناس بحالهم.

Original Translation: وملي صيفطهم، طلع للجبل بوحده باش يصلي. وبقى بوحده تم حتى جات العشية.

Original Translation: وفديك الساعة، تكلم معاهم يسوع وݣال: «تشجعو، أنا هو، ما تخافوش!».
